This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details the object first appeard as a bright light in thesky.object moved rapidly across the sky to come just slighlt over head.at thispoint the object stopped in mid-flight for about 5 seconds.the object made aslight course change and proceeded much slower than its previous rate. about 30seconds after the course change manouver the light changed to a moresilver\metal hue then very slowly faded away.when i first saw the object ithought it was a star, when i noticed movement i thought it was an airplane. iwas waiting for the jet engine sound and to see the blinking lights found onapproaching aircraft. neither of these two events occured. i became moreintrigued as i watched the object move very quickly across the sky. when theobject stopped i was stunned. i know this is not physicaly possible. then itchanged direction, i knew i was seeing something i could not really account for.when it disappeared all i could do was shake my head and go back inside myhouse.
Summary: bright light stopped change direstion then disappe
